CustomField.description: This field is for the Conga Contract Generation App, to explain the payment frequency whether it will be a Daily payment or a MCA holdback
CustomField.formula:
Case( Loan_Type__c,
"Fixed Daily [ACH Loan]", "$" &
IF(find(".", text(Daily_Payment3__c), 1)>1,
IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND(Daily_Payment3__c, 2)), 2),"."), Text(round( Daily_Payment3__c ,2)) & "0", Text(round( Daily_Payment3__c ,2))),
Text(Daily_Payment3__c) ) & IF(ISPICKVAL(Payment_Frequency__c, "Weekly"), " Weekly", " a Day"),
"Holdback [MCA]", TEXT(Daily_Holdback_Amount__c) & "% of Credit Card Sales",
"","", "" )
CustomField.label: Daily Payment or MCA
